org.sd.cluster.job.work
Class WorkPool

java.lang.Object
  org.sd.cluster.job.work.WorkPool

public class WorkPool
extends java.lang.Object

A thread pool for handling work units in multiple threads.

Author:
Spence Koehler

Field Detail

WAIT_INTERVAL

public static final int WAIT_INTERVAL
Millis to wait between checking for available slot.

Note that this will be a limiting factor in how quickly any data can be processed by workers!
